Text: So it appears that FoV will be releasing TopGear on eztv this season. Great, I love having to convert every show to a different codec because FoV is the only release group to use a format the WDTV Media Player doesn't recognise. Looks like Handbrake is going to get a workout this season.
evilgOd: My WDTV plays mp4 no problem, you must have an old version, maybe an update would cure it.. Thanks eztv

goodprick: It has never had an issue with any media including multiple sources of mp4 other than FoV releases. I can find no reason for it. When I run their files through Handbrake keeping them as normal mp4s they work fine.
Thanks for the update suggestion though. Last month's firmware update fixed it.
